from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from datetime import datetime
 
print("=" * 70)
print("OPENLINEAGE INTEGRATION TEST - FULL TEST")
print("=" * 70)
 
# Initialize Spark
spark = SparkSession.builder \
    .appName("openlineage_integration_test") \
    .getOrCreate()
 
print("\n Spark session started")
 
# Define paths using RAW and CURATED containers
timestamp = datetime.now().strftime('%Y%m%d_%H%M%S')
input_path = "abfss://raw@pinsstodwdevuksl92q7c.dfs.core.windows.net/test_ol/input.parquet"
output_path = f"abfss://curated@pinsstodwdevuksl92q7c.dfs.core.windows.net/test_ol/output_{timestamp}.parquet"
 
print(f"\n Input path:  {input_path}")
print(f" Output path: {output_path}")
 
 
# STEP 1: Create and write input data
 
print("\n" + "=" * 70)
print("STEP 1: Creating input data in RAW container")
print("=" * 70)
 
input_data = [
    (1, "Alice", "Engineering", 75000),
    (2, "Bob", "Sales", 65000),
    (3, "Charlie", "Engineering", 80000),
    (4, "Diana", "Marketing", 70000),
    (5, "Eve", "Engineering", 85000)
]
input_columns = ["id", "name", "department", "salary"]
 
df_input = spark.createDataFrame(input_data, input_columns)
 
print("\n Input data sample:")
df_input.show()
 
print(f"\n Writing input data to RAW...")
df_input.write.mode("overwrite").parquet(input_path)
print(" Input data written successfully")
 
 
# STEP 2: Read from RAW and transform
 
print("\n" + "=" * 70)
print("STEP 2: Reading from RAW and transforming")
print("=" * 70)
 
print(f"\n Reading from: {input_path}")
df_read = spark.read.parquet(input_path)
 
print("\n Applying transformations:")
print("   - Filter: department == 'Engineering'")
print("   - Select: id, name, salary")
print("   - Add column: salary_gbp (salary * 0.79)")
 
df_transformed = df_read.filter(df_read.department == "Engineering") \
                        .select("id", "name", "salary") \
                        .withColumn("salary_gbp", df_read.salary * 0.79)
 
print("\n Transformed data sample:")
df_transformed.show()
 
 
# STEP 3: Write to CURATED (THIS TRIGGERS OPENLINEAGE EVENTS!)
 
print("\n" + "=" * 70)
print("STEP 3: Writing to CURATED container")
print("=" * 70)
 
print(f"\n Writing output to: {output_path}")
df_transformed.write.mode("overwrite").parquet(output_path)
 
print("\n Output data written successfully!")
 
 
# STEP 4: Verify output
 
print("\n" + "=" * 70)
print("STEP 4: Verifying output")
print("=" * 70)
 
df_verify = spark.read.parquet(output_path)
row_count = df_verify.count()
 
print(f"\n Verified! Output contains {row_count} rows")
print("\n Output data sample:")
df_verify.show()
 
 
# SUMMARY
 
print("\n" + "=" * 70)
print(" TEST COMPLETED SUCCESSFULLY!")
print("=" * 70)
print(f"\n Input:  {input_path}")
print(f" Output: {output_path}")
print(f"\n {row_count} rows processed")
 
 
print("\n" + "=" * 70)
